AT.name: Brave Dungeon
AT.description: Syega are powerful crystals that grant humans the ability to use magic. Some crystals are so powerful they have to be contained in specially prepared vessels; these are known as Magic Items. Join intrepid adventurer Al as she explores the dangerous labyrinths of Belfer Island in search of powerful Magic Items. Along the way Al will join forces with strong allies and face even stronger enemies. Can Al conquer the imposing dungeon known as Godshill and find the ultimate Magic Item? Brave Dungeon is a dungeon crawling RPG adventure by indie games company INSIDE SYSTEM, creators of the Legend of Dark Witch series. Brave Dungeon features an easy to pick up combat system for new players. However, it also has many customization options, unique playable characters, and deep challenges for the completionist. A crafting system featuring materials dropped from enemies and treasure chests in dungeons allows you to customize your characters further. Class Changes allow the player to build their party the way they want, playing to one's own personal preferences and their characters' unique strengths.

Brave Dungeon is a dungeon crawling RPG adventure by indie games company INSIDE SYSTEM, creators of the Legend of Dark Witch series. Class Changes allow the player to build their party the way they want, playing to one's own personal preferences and their characters' unique strengths.

A crafting system featuring materials dropped from enemies and treasure chests in dungeons allows you to customize your characters further. BE.name: Brave Dungeon
BE.description: Syega sont des cristaux puissants qui donnent aux humains la possibilité d'utiliser la magie. Certains cristaux sont si puissants qu'ils doivent être contenus dans des vaisseaux spécialement préparés; Ils sont connus sous le nom d'articles magiques. Joignez-vous à l'intrépide aventurier Al qui explore les dangereux labyrinthes de l'île Belfer à la recherche d'objets magiques puissants. Le long de la route Al va unir ses forces avec de puissants alliés et affronter des ennemis encore plus forts. Al peut-il conquérir l'imposant donjon connu sous le nom Godshill et trouver l'objet magique ultime? Brave Dungeon est un dungeon rampant aventure RPG par la société indie jeux INSIDE SYSTEM, créateurs de la série Legend of Dark Witch. Brave Dungeon dispose d'un système de combat facile à ramasser pour les nouveaux joueurs. Cependant, il a également beaucoup d'options de personnalisation, de caractères jouables uniques, et de défis profonds pour le completionist. Un système d'artisanat mettant en vedette des matériaux tombés des ennemis et des trésors dans les donjons vous permet de personnaliser vos personnages plus loin. Les changements de classe permettent au joueur de construire son parti comme ils le veulent, en jouant selon ses propres préférences personnelles et les forces uniques de leurs personnages.

SK.description: Syega are powerful crystals that grant humans the ability to use magic. Some crystals are so powerful they have to be contained in specially prepared vessels; these are known as Magic Items. Join intrepid adventurer Al as she explores the dangerous labyrinths of Belfer Island in search of powerful Magic Items. Along the way Al will join forces with strong allies and face even stronger enemies. Can Al conquer the imposing dungeon known as Godshill and find the ultimate Magic Item? Brave Dungeon is a dungeon crawling RPG adventure by indie games company INSIDE SYSTEM, creators of the Legend of Dark Witch series. Brave Dungeon features an easy to pick up combat system for new players. However, it also has many customization options, unique playable characters, and deep challenges for the completionist. A crafting system featuring materials dropped from enemies and treasure chests in dungeons allows you to customize your characters further. Class Changes allow the player to build their party the way they want, playing to one's own personal preferences and their characters' unique strengths.
